column3: Tourism;Kampot:------ Responding to criticism about lighting at the Durian roundabout the Central City team decided  to unplug the lights after three nights of testing.------On the night of December 8
column5: the Durian in the center of Kampot town had decorative lights removed
column6: in response to the criticism. People expressed their appreciation they were gone
column7: and the fruit statue is back to normal.------Technicians put up the lights and conducted tests from December 5-7
column9: red and white to represent the flag proved unpopular
